item.title: Guts, Glory, and Statistics: My Summer Internship at Rotational
item.description: While not always rational (or even helpful) our intuition fundamentally shapes how we think. In this post, summer intern Julie illustrates how she uses statistics to keep her analyses grounded, and how that translates to business value.
